welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ban Bang Phlap, Thailand! Known for its charming atmosphere and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Muang Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Don Muang Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.
